channel.title: Installing KDE 3.5 from 4
channel.description: Hello, I was just wondering How I could install KDE 3.5. I thought I would test it out. But I can't seem to find one tut online. The only lead that I found that MIGHT be somewhat useful ended up at a 403. So if anyone knows how to downgrade, I would appreciate it if you could instruct me. Thanks.

item.title: Installing KDE 3.5 from 4
item.dc:creator: @Tree_Climber Tree_Climber
item.description:
@Tree_Climber wrote:

What linux distro do you use?
For Arch I believe it’s “pacman -S kdemod”
But I suggest using something like GNOME or Xfce

Read full topic
